name: Due Date
description:
Your Art assignment is due in 20 seconds... Will you see what's beyond?

A tiny game about deadlines.

  • Explore a rich desktop enviroment with diverse interactions and secrets
  • Experience the thrill of student syndrome without risking your health!
  • Fully featured files & windows management engine
  • #1 accurate representation of working with Adobe products

20 second jam 2022
